main event: A black smoke trail followed by an explosion was observed on 26 January 1955 in Lakeland, Florida.
interesting points: The sighting involved one object, which fell after producing a smoke trail and an explosion., The observer was a civilian in downtown Lakeland., The time of the sighting was reported at 15:15 EST., The object was believed to reach a height of around 1000 yards before the explosion., The incident was initially recorded by the Project Blue Book.
